review_data.title: Perfect ricotta pistacchio ice cream
review_data.content: Besides having great coffee products, their ice creams are absolutely amazing. Made from Italian ingredients, the ricotta-pistacchio flavor is one of the best I ever tasted. One shouldn’t be taken aback by the gelateria being in a shopping center, the place is a proper cafe...More

review_data.title: Top, top, top, top
review_data.content: Jedes mal wenn ich hier rein komme, gehe ich immer sehr glücklich raus. Top service, top glaces, top kaffee, top...More

review_data.title: Best Ice Cream in Zurich!!
review_data.content: Das beste Glace in Zürich! Mein absoluter Favorit.. Man merkt, das Eis wird mit sehr viel Liebe hergestellt. Der Service...More

review_data.title: Gelateria Caffetteria ORO, Zurigo
review_data.content: Il miglior gelato nel cuore di Zurigo. Tipici gusti italiani. La gelateria, offre anche il servizio bar/ caffetteria…senza farsi mancare...More
